name: Holiday Inn Express Oakdale

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having stopped in various Express by Holiday Inns, this was the standard I would expect from any. Friendly and helpful staff, spacious and comfortable rooms. All basic ammenities you require. Laundry room on site. And of course hot or continental breakfast, which seemed to be replenished frequently.
reviews.title: Clean, quiet and comfortable...just what I'd expect

reviews.text: Would recommend this hotel without doubt to anyone who is trying to split up a long journey between cities.
reviews.title: Good stopoff between Yosemite and San Francisco

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were exhausted by all the driving in Yosemite, so we were glad to rest overnight in Oakdale HI. Breakfast was good and room size was adequate. Ryderz restaurant across the street was a good cross between Friendly's and TGI Friday's. Small outside pool.
reviews.title: Thin comfort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We checked into this hotel for one night as we were making our way from SFO to Yosemite after arriving on a late afternoon flight. This was a good location for that - about two thirds of the distance covered and in a town that did offer a choice of eating spots for dinner. However the hotel itself was extremely disappointing and really not very pleasant. The room, though clean enough was really shabby with cheap flimsy old furniture and the thinest scratchiest sheets and towels I have ever been offered. If I had not seen th sign I would have thought I was in a Super 8. The shower was at chin height and I have never met with such flat pillows. It looked like a hippopotamus must be been sitting on them for at least a year. The room was so overheated that we had to leave the window open all night which was not very secure in a ground-level room. The complementary breakfast was supposed to be at 7 but did not actually emerge till 7:30 as we were on our way out having given up waiting.
reviews.title: Enjoyable Time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everyone there was really nice and the room was great. They had us down for the wrong type of room but took care of it immediately. Very helpful about places to see. Had coffee going in lounge area, small but nice workout room and the pool was nice size and clean. I would stay there again. Great restaurant across the street from them.
reviews.title: Good breakfast
Best service/breakfast/room
reviews.text: After standing outside the BW Rama Inn and getting no service at 1235AM we decided to head down the road to the Holiday Inn Express. We were treated well, the room was excellent (clean, lots of amenities), the free continental breakfast was the best, and a woman named Jeanine was the friendliest staff person ever. I would not hesitate to recommend this place.
This is one of the best hotel i stayed in my whole trip.Staff is nice and friendly.Excellent breakfast,Nice and Clean room.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: We stayed here for four days on a business trip. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and of good size. My biggest complaint, and why I would most likely not stay here again, was the noise.
reviews.title: Clean, but noisy.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The walls and floors are thin so you can hear everything going on upstairs and hear any conversation going on outside. We moved rooms once after hearing the couple upstairs! And one morning a man was talking on his cell phone outside our room and I could hear every word of his conversation as if he was in the room.
reviews.title: Great restaurant across the way

reviews.text: The maid service begins at 8AM, so if you have any intentions to sleep past 8, this is NOT the place to do it. You can hear the carts rolling on the concrete and women talking to one another in the halls.
reviews.title: A gem among mediocre motels

likes.disliked: — No elevators to the second floor

reviews.text: One night, around 1am we were woken up by yelling and pounding on doors and realized it was coming from a room on the opposite side of the hotel. They cater to workers in the area and on our trip we could hear people in the hall at 6AM yelling for others to wake up.
reviews.title: ok for stop in Oakdale

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is really a great place to stay. the room was large, clean and we really enjoyed the pool after our journey from san francisco. breakfast was nice with plenty of food to choose from. It's a great place on the way to yosemite (only 2hours drive there)
reviews.title: great place to stay

reviews.text: We definitely recommend it it's good value for the money.
reviews.title: Superb Hotel

likes.liked: — Location, friendly staff, and clean accommodation

reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel :)
reviews.text: Walked in to this hotel off the street, looking for somewhere to stay between Yosemite, and Monterey.

reviews.title: Perfect Place
reviews.text: Overall service and cleanliness was excellent, receptionist was very helpful, room was great value for money, and spotlessly clean.

aka: Holiday Inn Express Oakdale Hotel Oakdale
description: Settle into one of our cozy, comfortable guestrooms and discover spacious convenience in the heart of California's Gold Country. Each stylish accommodation at our Bed & Breakfast style hotel features contemporary amenities, efficient work space, and a relaxing atmosphere to unwind. The Holiday Inn Express Oakdale offers a wide selection of rooms, including rooms with two queen-size beds or one king - size bed, and meeting facilities. Accommodation choices include: Jacuzzi rooms, and non-smoking rooms. Free high-speed internet access. Each guestroom features: refrigerator, microwave, coffee-maker, hair dryer, vanity mirror, iron/ironing board and electronic door locks. We also have wheel chair accessable rooms. Safe Deposit Boxes available. All rooms feature large-flat screen TV and free expanded cable. Rooms are fully equipped with large work desk, modem connection, digital voice mail, and alarm-clock radio. Our meeting room is complete with: audio and video equipment - VCR, TV, Screen and easel.
